document_data.title:
Defenders of the Faith:
A Guidebook to Clerics and Paladins
document_data.author: [[Rich Redman]], [[James Wyatt]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Defenders of the Faith''''' is an accessory for the 3{{rd}}-edition of {{dnd}} ruleset.
{{quote|'''''Divine dedication powers these crusaders.'''''

''This book spotlights the champions of deities in the D&D game, [[clerics]] and [[paladins]]. It's packed with ways to customize cleric and paladin characters, including:''

* ''New feats, [[prestige classes]], weapons, and equipment ''
* ''More uses for turning checks, and new magic items and spells designed specially for clerics and paladins ''
* ''Information about special organizations such as the Laughing Knives and the Stargazers ''
* ''Detailed maps of temples that players and Dungeon Masters can use as bases of operation or as enemy structures that must be brought down''}}
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Chapter 1: Clerics and Paladins
* Chapter 2: Churches and Organizations
* Chapter 3: Prestige Classes
* Chapter 4: Divine Magic
document_data.Description: ''Defenders of the Faith'' provides supplemental information for characters belonging to the [[cleric]] and [[paladin]] base classes. This book introduced Divine Feats, and also contained tips for creating and playing characters of the aforementioned class, as well as several prestige classes.
